creator: jeremias@apache.org
text: When loading XML-based images (like SVG) through the image loading framework, it can happen that external DTDs are referenced and have to be loaded. This can either block/fail the loading process or at least make it very slow. Providing an XML resolver that the preloader plug-ins can use should solve that problem.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> When loading XML-based images (like SVG) through the image loading framework,
> it can happen that external DTDs are referenced and have to be loaded. This can
> either block/fail the loading process or at least make it very slow. Providing
> an XML resolver that the preloader plug-ins can use should solve that problem.

do you have a suggested patch?
